entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
